Name: Hot Wine Lemonade
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: POUR first three ingredients into warmed glass and top up with boiling water.
Review: This citrusy mulled wine is simply made with hot red wine and freshly squeezed lemon juice.
Nutrition: One serving of Hot Wine Lemonade contains 131 calories
